capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role requires effective planning to implement biodiversity programs and manage knowledge resources.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Analyzing data to identify trends and recommending improvements requires problem-solving skills.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Clear communication is essential for developing training resources and engaging with stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with team members and stakeholders is crucial for the role's success.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Managing and implementing biodiversity programs aligns with project management capabilities.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: The role requires adherence to policies and proactive risk management.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting diverse backgrounds and perspectives is important in engaging with a wide range of stakeholders.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging effectively with stakeholders to provide advice and support on biodiversity policies.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.description: Analyzing data to identify trends and improve program outcomes.

skills.name: Biodiversity Policy Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding of biodiversity policy and programs, including the Biodiversity Offset Scheme.

generalRole.title: Environmental Project Officer
generalRole.description: This role focuses on the development and implementation of environmental programs, specifically related to biodiversity conservation. It requires a blend of project management skills, stakeholder engagement, and a deep understanding of environmental policies.
